name: My Furry Maid 🐾
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1957130/Night_of_Love/

STORY


Okay, to be fair - we don't have a real made here, but we have a hot actress who wants to be one! And she wears a maid costume anyway, so who cares?

My Furry Maid is a kinetic novel about a guy who works as a teacher in a housekeeping school and his new student Anna. She wants to study maid classes for a role in a TV-Show, so he'll have to teach her etiquette, housing and cooking for a whole week. How long will she last until falling in love with him? Let's find out!

(And, as usual for "My Furry" series - we have a little bit of drama, serious topics and "slice of life" stuff).

FEATURES


• About 1,5 hours of content
• Exciting story
• HD fully original artworks
• Cute cat maid!
